Instance.description: A picker interaction that shows an object dialog that contains a list of service npcs that can be hired. Service npcs that can be recurring will get 2 entries in the dialog - a one time one and a recurring one.

Tunable.name: display_price_fee_and_hourly_cost
Tunable.display: Display Price Fee And Hourly Cost
Tunable.description: Formatting for cost of the service if it has an upfront cost AND an hourly cost Parameters: 0 is upfront cost of service. 1 is hourly cost of service

Tunable.name: display_price_flat_rate
Tunable.description: Formatting for cost of the service if it has just a one time flat fee. Parameters: 0 is flat rate cost of the service

Tunable.name: display_price_free
Tunable.description: Description text if the service has zero upfront cost and zero hourly cost.

Tunable.name: display_price_hourly_cost
Tunable.description: Formatting for cost of the service if it is purely hourly Parameters: 0 is hourly cost of the service

TunableList.name: non_service_npcs
TunableList.description: A List of non service NPCs that can be hired using the 'Hire A Service' UI.

TunableTuple.description: The Data needed to display the non service NPC in the 'Hire A Service' UI.

TunableVariant.name: cost_string
TunableVariant.description: When enabled, the tuned string will be shown as the cost of hiring this NPC.

Tunable.name: no_cost_string
Tunable.description: The description to be used for this NPC in the if there isn't a cost associated with it

TunableList.name: free_service_traits
TunableList.description: If any Sim in the household has one of these traits, the non service npc will be free.

Tunable.name: hire_interaction
Tunable.description: The affordance to push the sim making the call when hiring this service npc from a picker dialog from the phone.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: The icon to be displayed in 'Hire a Service' UI

Tunable.name: name
Tunable.description: The name to be displayed for this NPC in the 'Hire a Service' UI.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A set of global tests that are always run before other tests. All tests must pass in order for the interaction to run.

TunableList.name: service_npcs
TunableList.description: A list of the service npcs that will show up in the dialog picker

TunableTuple.description: Tuple of service npcs data about those NPCs being pickable.

Tunable.name: already_hired_tooltip
Tunable.description: Tooltip that displays if the service has already been hired.

Tunable.name: service_npc
Tunable.description: The service npcs that will show up in the picker.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A set of tests that determine if this service npc will show up as available or greyed out in the picker.
